page.title: 20A summary of Haworth
page.content: The village has been transformed into a major tourist attraction in this century by the genius of the vicar's daughters in the mid-nineteenth century.The{Bronte sisters}set their novels solidly in this locality which in itself made them unusual at the time.Later{Mrs Gaskell},herself a notable novelist,wrote a life of { {Charlotte Bronte}describing the short,sad lives of the talented sisters. Since local government reorganisation in 1968,{Haworth}has been in the Bradford Metropolitan County Council area and many local services are run from Keighley. ____________________________________ {CONTRIBUTORS Bradford Girls' Grammar School Manningham Middle School,Bradford Haworth First School
